body:
38 here and fucking loving it. I am experienced enough to make good decisions, but not too old to enjoy a night of raging on the town. I make sure to keep myself healthy, well read and in shape so I don't feel like I am slowing down at all.

My dad is a 67 year old dynamo and he says that every year he is alive is better than the year before. I agree with him so far.

38 here and fucking loving it. I am experienced enough to make good decisions, but not too old to enjoy a night of raging on the town. I make sure to keep myself healthy, well read and in shape so I don't feel like I am slowing down at all.

body:
Makes sense, so is Reddit.

My running theory is that text-centric and forum-style services tend to have more male users, while image-centric and feed-style services tend to have more female users. Platforms with more female users than male users (tumblr, pinterest, instagram) tend to have those traits. Would love to see an actual study on this.
body_html:
Makes sense, so is Reddit.

My running theory is that text-centric and forum-style services tend to have more male users, while image-centric and feed-style services tend to have more female users. But that's just my opinion.
